Hero.title: Fleet and workforce
Hero.description: Track vehicle entry and exit, routes, time on site, and upload photo reports — even offline. All data syncs automatically and is ready for accounting and reporting.

Features.title: Everything you need for fleet control
Features.subtitle: Modern tools to track vehicles, routes, and employees — even without internet connection

nfcTracking.title: NFC Vehicle Tracking
nfcTracking.description: Attach NFC tags to vehicles. Scan to instantly log entry/exit with timestamp and location.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Works without internet. All data syncs automatically when connection is restored.

routeTracking.title: Route Tracking
routeTracking.description: Track complete routes with GPS. See where vehicles have been and for how long.

photoReports.title: Photo Reports
photoReports.description: Upload photos of cargo, documents, or site conditions. Everything stored in the cloud.

timeTracking.title: Time on Site
timeTracking.description: Know exactly how long each vehicle spent at each location. Perfect for billing.

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.description: Generate reports for accounting. Track mileage, time, and validate against work orders.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes. No complex setup required.

step1.title: Attach NFC tags
step1.description: Stick NFC tags on each vehicle. One-time setup that takes seconds.

step2.title: Scan on entry/exit
step2.description: Staff scans the tag when vehicle enters or leaves. Add photos if needed.

step3.title: Automatic tracking
step3.description: Route points are recorded. GPS data captured. Works offline too.

step4.title: View & export data
step4.description: See real-time status in dashboard. Export reports for accounting.
